markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />command, interact ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117))    **Effect** You point the _Spiral Athame_ to the sky and pray, warding creatures against undead. This has the effect of 3rd-level [_circle of protection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=38), except it wards against undead creatures rather than creatures of a specified alignment, and the emanation is centered on the _Spiral Athame_.
